title: Unfair permaban
body:
Nazi tribunal system strikes again - innocent player gets banned, flamer gets away with it. Good job riot

Game 1
Igor Durszlakov: reported for this gank
Igor Durszlakov: no one asked you
Igor Durszlakov: adn you fucked up my lane, ty
Igor Durszlakov: im not following unless he is gaking
Igor Durszlakov: crappy offense xD
Igor Durszlakov: 10 ganks yi top
Igor Durszlakov: xin 0
Igor Durszlakov: not even once
Igor Durszlakov: then u got report
Igor Durszlakov: for refusing to communicate and trolling
Igor Durszlakov: and for that now too
Igor Durszlakov: you are getting banned now
Igor Durszlakov: you are a flamer who refuses to gank
Igor Durszlakov: you are getting ban
Igor Durszlakov: not me
Igor Durszlakov: report xin
Igor Durszlakov: refusing to gank top+ heavy flame
Igor Durszlakov: next report
Igor Durszlakov: WTF
Igor Durszlakov: tower does nothing
Igor Durszlakov: why the fuck you lost all dragons
Igor Durszlakov: like mid is only yours
Igor Durszlakov: xD
Igor Durszlakov: YOU were verbal
Igor Durszlakov: not me
Igor Durszlakov: who said kys to me? YOU
Igor Durszlakov: nope
Igor Durszlakov: xin offensive as fuck
Igor Durszlakov: and says that its em
Igor Durszlakov: 1000000x more offensive than entire team and blames me for flame
Igor Durszlakov: said kys to me when I asked him to gank
Igor Durszlakov: and its ME who is flaming
Igor Durszlakov: I WASNT FLAMING I WAS BEING FLAMED FFS
Igor Durszlakov: PREMADES DEFENDING EACH OTHER
Igor Durszlakov: y ofc I am toxic because I said xin flamed me?
Igor Durszlakov: stop defending the guilty
Igor Durszlakov: no cause I am getting unfair reports again
Igor Durszlakov: for nothing
Igor Durszlakov: I AM TOXIC?
Igor Durszlakov: WHAT THE HELL
Igor Durszlakov: CAN YOU STOP LYING?
Igor Durszlakov: yea i have no words for you
Igor Durszlakov: liars
Igor Durszlakov: and since when its falme?
Igor Durszlakov: worst liar ever
Igor Durszlakov: YOU were verbal
Igor Durszlakov: you damn liar
Igor Durszlakov: xin was verbal not me

replies.body:
>innocent player gets banned

Literallyevery other line in that chatlog was either an insult, belitteling, QQ or a report threat.

Innocent? No.

#BAN DESERVED.
So the only way to play this game is disabling chat completely. Gj riot for totally ruining a good game with this bullshit system

I chat all the time, including jokes and strong language.

And yet, here I stand, not banned.

Wanna know how I do it?

Manners.

You can't deny that this system is unfair towards players that get tilted off their team mates and have the human reaction to get annoyed, people just have triggers and riot bans them for being human. Bruh.
You can be a human and have the good sense to refrain from typing crap for half an hour. Yell your lungs out at the screen if you must vent, just don't type.

The system doesn't have to be fair towards people who get "tilted" and become toxic themselves.

The system is in place to prevent toxicity...ALL TOXICITY.

Do you think I don't get toxic morons in my games?
But I do what a grown up does: I mute them, report them afterwards, and laugh privately when they get banned.
God damn you're a crybaby in this chat log. Mute the fuckers, stop typing, and get out of DQ.
Well Xin warned you. He told you your behavior will probably result in a ban. And instead of apologizing u continued being toxic.  Deserved ban
So a player can decide whether you are allowed to continue to play this game or not while being extremely toxic and offensive towards you, provoking you to reliate and get the account banned? Bruh.

> [{quoted}](name=Zozzi,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O9sWX4Ak,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-06-21T12:50:41.580+0000)
>
> So a player can decide whether you are allowed to continue to play this game or not while being extremely toxic and offensive towards you, provoking you to reliate and get the account banned? Bruh.

What?
He can be toxic towards you, provoke you as is human nature and therefore under riots terms....you can get banned as well, how is this fair on him in the slightest.

> [{quoted}](name=Zozzi,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=O9sWX4Ak,comment-id=000a000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-21T13:11:38.854+0000)
>
> He can be toxic towards you, provoke you as is human nature and therefore under riots terms....you can get banned as well, how is this fair on him in the slightest.

Did u read chat log?  His very first sentence was threat to report xin for obviously failed gank. it was never against rules to fail gank, its not reportable offense and OP obviously started with threats just to be toxic.  Then he lost lane and blamed Xin, then he blamed Xin again and threatened with reports for not ganking (which again is not reportable). Then he kept threatening and Xin obviously warned him that he is being toxic. OP is just one of those players who cant accept fact that he was beaten on lane due to his own incompetence and in order to feel better about himself he decided to abuse his jungler. He got punished for it and it was deserved
League is one of those games that is just unbelievably soft. No level of shit talking or negative attitude is allowed if you're gonna play this game. That's pretty stupid tbh.

Uh it is allowed if you do it respectfully, and at the end of the day it is a game... a game that's meant to be fair and fun for all and in good nature. Flaming and toxic behaviour goes against the very definition the rules/code of this game

Be like Adam, use the mute.

https://media.tenor.com/images/3f51ca750494ee77d16bb173fb8a81ab/tenor.gif
1st word typed is "reported" (against rules) need I read on?
you can direct a call for gank , but you go overboard or mb in a mad way but you still went over board
Basically, when i asked for gank he immediately said kys, i will fuck up your lane and I wont gank, his premade defending him all the time, etc.

And you think the misbehavior of others excuses your own?

Becaus...no, it doesn't.

So they're are allowed to tilt him off the face of the earth and provoke him to say things that are only mildly toxic and then he gets permanently banned? Riot needs to start getting real about things.

He could have pressed the mute button or said something else. Better yet, he could have said nothing at all and focused more on the game. Junglers not ganking shouldn't be a new phenomenon... and if you're getting camped  it means the other side of the map is open and it should be encouraged to solidify objectives on that side of the map

If someone behaves toxic, he gets punished, period.

This is not Kindergarten..._"he started it first!!!"_ doesn't count, and neither does _"but he hit me first so I HAD to punch him back!!!!"_.

This is the grown up world.

People here can be reasonably expected to keep their cool, even when facing morons in chat. If someone is toxic in chat and tries to "tilt"his teammates, mute that person and report him afterwards.

If instead someone replies to him in kind, BOTH get punished for toxicity.
Cry More
Did you report this again for downvote farming?
I bet you voted for Donald Trump XDDDD #makechatgreatagain
So you get perma for being a crybaby now? Really? I want this completely undeserved ban raised and I am not going to stop spamming here until moderator checks my case
you should be submitting a support ticket not spamming here... moderators only have limited control over the boards and nothing to do with the actual game
the only thing moderators here check is your privilege.
